workflow.name: Auto-generate developer invoices & compliance reminders with Jira and Gmail
workflow.description:
## üìò Description
This automation streamlines developer billing and compliance tracking by integrating Jira, Gmail, and n8n into a single intelligent workflow.
 It fetches all project issues from Jira, calculates logged hours per team member, identifies missing time entries, and automatically generates professional invoice summaries ‚Äî complete with text attachments ‚Äî which are then emailed to each developer.
The system ensures no time logs are missed, billing remains accurate, and finance teams receive transparent, auditable records ‚Äî all without manual follow-ups.

## ‚öôÔ∏è What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)

üü¢ When Clicking ‚ÄòExecute Workflow‚Äô
Starts the entire billing and compliance cycle manually or on schedule.

üìã Fetch All Project Issues with Time Data
Retrieves all Jira issues across projects, including:
- Time spent (seconds ‚Üí hours)
- Assignee, project, sprint, and status info
- Priority and issue summaries
-  This serves as the foundation for billing calculations and compliance checks.

üìä Aggregate Hours by Team Member
Groups issues by assignee and calculates total hours logged per person.
 Outputs per-user data with:
- Name & email
- Total logged hours
- Full issue breakdown (status, sprint, priority)
-  Forms the core dataset for both invoice creation and reminder logic.

‚ö†Ô∏è Identify Issues with Missing Time Logs
Scans aggregated data to find issues where time = 0 hours.
 Generates HTML reminders with:
- Table of unlogged issues (key, summary, sprint, status)
- Personalized note urging time entry completion
-  Only sends reminders to users who actually missed logs.
-  Prevents manual follow-up and ensures billing accuracy.

üí∞ Generate Invoice Summary with Text Attachment
Creates text-based invoice documents for each user with logged hours.
 Includes:
- Itemized issue breakdowns
- Hourly rate (default: $50/hr)
- Total hours & billing amount
- Auto-generated timestamp
-  Exports invoices as text attachments (Invoice_{Assignee}.txt) in base64.

üîó Combine Reminder & Invoice Data Streams
Merges invoice data and reminder data into one unified stream, ensuring:
- All users (with or without logged hours) are processed
- Emails contain correct context and attachments
-  Enables complete communication coverage in a single workflow.

üîß Reconcile JSON & Binary Attachments
- Smartly merges JSON email metadata and binary invoice files post-merge.
-  Handles complex data cases (missing binary or JSON) using fallback logic.
-  Guarantees each email has a valid recipient and invoice attachment.

üìß Send Invoices & Reminders to Team
Sends personalized emails to each developer with:
- Subject: project name
- Body: hours summary & reminder message
- Attachment: invoice text file (if available)
-  Emails are automatically delivered via Gmail with audit trails.

## üß© Prerequisites
Jira Software Cloud API credentials
Gmail OAuth2 connection
Configured hourly billing rate (default: $50/hr)
Active n8n instance (self-hosted or cloud)

## üí° Key Benefits
 ‚úÖ Eliminates manual invoice generation
 ‚úÖ Ensures accurate time tracking & compliance
 ‚úÖ Sends automated reminders for missing hours
 ‚úÖ Provides transparent, auditable billing communication
 ‚úÖ Saves finance & project teams hours of manual effort

## üë• Perfect For
- Tech & IT service companies billing by developer hours
- Project managers tracking time compliance
- Finance teams ensuring timely invoicing
- Agencies managing multiple sprint-based projects

parameters.content:
Combine Reminder & Invoice Data Streams

Action: Merges reminder and invoice outputs for unified processing.
Description:

Combines both branches (missing hours and invoice data).

Ensures all team members get relevant communication.

Keeps all data intact for the next reconciliation step.

Identify Issues with Missing Time Logs

Action: Detects issues where time wasn‚Äôt logged.
Description:

Scans each user‚Äôs issues to find zero-hour entries.

Generates HTML reminder messages listing missing issues.

Creates reminders only for users with actual missing logs.

Ensures timely and accurate billing compliance.

Aggregate Hours by Team Member

Action: Groups Jira issues by each assignee and totals their hours.
Description:

Calculates total logged hours per user.

Keeps issue details like summary, status, and sprint.

Handles missing data (unassigned or null time entries).

Produces structured user-level data for invoices and reminders.

Fetch All Project Issues with Time Data

Action: Retrieves all Jira issues with time tracking info.
Description:

Uses Jira API to fetch every issue with getAll and returnAll.

Collects essential fields like keys, summaries, time spent, and assignee.

Provides project, sprint, and priority details.

Serves as the base dataset for billing and reporting.

Generate Invoice Summary with Text Attachment

Action: Creates detailed text-based invoices per user.
Description:

Calculates billing using a default hourly rate ($50/hour).

Lists each issue with hours and status.

Exports a plain-text invoice as .txt (base64 encoded).

Skips users with zero hours to avoid empty invoices.

Sends structured JSON + binary data for email delivery

Send Invoices & Reminders to Team

Action: Sends personalized emails with invoices and reminders.
Description:

Sends to each developer‚Äôs email dynamically.

Includes name, project, and total hours in the message.

Attaches generated invoice files.

Can be extended to CC managers or finance.

Final delivery step for automated billing communication.

Reconcile JSON & Binary Attachments

Action: Aligns JSON data with corresponding invoice files.
Description:

Matches items using assignee name as identifier.

Fixes cases where JSON or binary is missing.

Guarantees each record includes both email info and invoice.

Prevents send failures and ensures complete data merging.

parameters.message:
=Hi {{$json["assignee"]}},

Please find attached your invoice summary for {{$json["project_name"]}}.

üìä Total Hours: {{ $('Aggregate Hours by Team Member').item.json.total_hours }}
Regards,
Techdome Billing Automation Bot
parameters.subject: ={{ $json.project_name }}

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.
